com.halseyburgund.rwframework.util
Class RWList

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.ArrayList<RWListItem>
              com.halseyburgund.rwframework.util.RWList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<RWListItem>, java.util.Collection<RWListItem>, java.util.List<RWListItem>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class RWList
extends java.util.ArrayList<RWListItem>

The RWList contains all the selectable options for all tags. It is a convenience mechanism to pass this tag data to views and to the action factory.

Author:
Rob Knapen
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

RWList

public RWList()
Creates an empty instance.

RWList

public RWList(RWTags tags)
Creates an instance based on the specified tags.

Parameters:
tags - to include in the RWList
Method Detail

initFromTags

public void initFromTags(RWTags tags)
Initializes the RWList instance from the specified tags. Any previous content will be erased, and new RWListItem instances added based on the tags. It will also set the information about the minimum required number of selected items, and the maximum allowed.

Parameters:
tags - to initialize the list with

filter

public RWList filter(RWTags.RWTag tag)
Creates a new RWList instance by filtering the items in the list on the specified tag. The RWListItems are shared between the lists, no copies are created!

Parameters:
tag - to filter on
Returns:
RWList with shared RWListItems matching the specified tag

createSublist

public RWList createSublist(RWTags.RWTag tag)
Creates a new RWList instance with new RWListItems for all the items in the list that match the specified tag.

Parameters:
tag - to filter on
Returns:
RWList with new RWListItems matching the specified tag

removeAll

public void removeAll(RWTags.RWTag tag)
Removes all items from the list that match the specified tag.

Parameters:
tag - to remove list items for, null will clear all

clearSelection

public RWList clearSelection()
Deselects all items. Note that this does not respect the minimum selection size requirement.

Returns:
self, with all items deselected

clearSelection

public RWList clearSelection(RWTags.RWTag tag)
Deselects all items that match the specified tag. Note that this does not respect the minimum selection size requirement.

Parameters:
tag - to deselect items for
Returns:
self, with all items for the give tag deselected

getSelectedCount

public int getSelectedCount()
Returns the number of selected items in the list for all tags.

Returns:
number of selected items

getSelectedCount

public int getSelectedCount(RWTags.RWTag tag)
Returns the number of selected items in the list for a given tag.

Parameters:
tag - to count selected items for
Returns:
number of selected items

isSingleSelect

public boolean isSingleSelect(RWTags.RWTag tag)
Returns true if the list is a single select list, i.e. there must be only one item selected at all times.

Returns:
true if the list is single select

select

public boolean select(RWListItem item)
Sets the specified item to selected, if allowed by the mode and selection requirements of the list. This method will not allow exceeding the set maximum number of selected items, and if the list is single select automatically switch the selected items.

Parameters:
item - to be selected
Returns:
true if the item is set to selected

deselect

public boolean deselect(RWListItem item)
Sets the specified item to not selected, if allowed by the mode and selection requirements of the list. This method will not allow breaking the set minimum required selected items.

Parameters:
item - to set to not selected
Returns:
true if the item is set to not selected

getSelectedItems

public RWList getSelectedItems()
Creates a new RWList with all the selected items.

Returns:
RWList with the selected RWListItems

getSelectedItems

public RWList getSelectedItems(RWTags.RWTag tag)
Creates a new RWList with all the selected items.

Parameters:
tag - to get all selected items for
Returns:
RWList with the selected RWListItems

selectAll

public RWList selectAll()
Forces all items in the list to be set to selected. This might break the set minimum and maximum requirements for the selection.

Returns:
Self, with all items set to selected

selectAll

public RWList selectAll(RWTags.RWTag tag)
Forces all items in the list matching the specified tag, to be set to selected. This might break the set minimum and maximum requirements for the selection.

Parameters:
tag - to set all matching items to selected for
Returns:
Self, with all items matching the tag set to selected

autoSelectSingleItemForTags

public RWList autoSelectSingleItemForTags(java.util.List<RWTags.RWTag> tags)
For each of the specified tags check if there is only one option available in the list and if so set it to selected.

Parameters:
tags - to auto select single options for
Returns:
Self, with single option tags selected

autoSelectSingleItemForTag

public RWList autoSelectSingleItemForTag(RWTags.RWTag tag)
For the specified tag check if there is only one option available in the list and if so set it to selected.

Parameters:
tag - to auto select single options for
Returns:
Self, with single option tags selected

getAllTags

public RWTags.RWTag[] getAllTags()
Returns a list of all RWTags currently references by all the items (RWListItem) in the list.

Returns:
list of all RWTag instances referenced

hasValidSelectionsForTags

public boolean hasValidSelectionsForTags(RWTags.RWTag... tags)
Checks for the specified tags if the list contains valid selections, i.e. for each tag the number of selected items is no less than the minimum number of required selected items, and not more than the maximum number of allowed selected items.

Parameters:
tags - to validate selections for
Returns:
true if for each of the tags there is a valid selection

hasValidSelectionsForTags

public boolean hasValidSelectionsForTags()
Checks for all tags reference in the list if there are valid selections, i.e. for each tag the number of selected items is no less than the minimum number of required selected items, and not more than the maximum of allowed selected items.

Returns:
true if the list has valid selections for all tags

saveSelectionState

public boolean saveSelectionState(SharedPreferences prefs)
Saves the current selection state of the list to the specified shared preferences.

Parameters:
prefs - to store list selection state in
Returns:
true when successful

restoreSelectionState

public boolean restoreSelectionState(SharedPreferences prefs)
Restores the selection state of the list from the specified shared preferences.

Parameters:
prefs - to restore list selection state from
Returns:
true when successful
